---
title: "Astronauts"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(maps)

world <- map_data("world")
capitals <- as_tibble(world.cities) %>%
        filter(capital == 1)

tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2020-07-14')
astronauts <- tuesdata$astronauts

astronauts <- astronauts %>%
        select(number, name, sex, nationality) %>%
        distinct(number, .keep_all = TRUE)
        group_by(nationality) %>%
        count(sex)

ggplot() +
        geom_polygon(data = world, aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), fill = "gray", alpha = .3) +
        coord_quickmap()
        
```
